Question: What is the percentage of individuals who have used substances in the last month, compared to those who have never used substances?
Explanation: This question compares the frequency of substance abuse in the last month (9.6%) to those who have never used substances (80.1%).

Question: What is the percentage of individuals who have used substances more than a year ago, compared to those who have used substances in the last year?
Explanation: This question compares the frequency of substance abuse more than a year ago (6.3%) to those who have used substances in the last year (4.0%).

Question: What is the average percentage of individuals who have used substances in the last year, compared to those who have never used substances?
Explanation: This question calculates the average percentage of individuals who have used substances in the last year (2.3%) and compares it to those who have never used substances (80.1%).

Question: What is the percentage of individuals who have used Anabolic steroids, compared to those who have used Heroin?
Explanation: This question compares the frequency of substance abuse of Anabolic steroids (2.1%) to those who have used Heroin (0.5%).

Question: What is the percentage of individuals who have used substances in the last month, compared to those who have used substances more than a year ago?
Explanation: This question compares the frequency of substance abuse in the last month (9.6%) to those who have used substances more than a year ago (6.3%).
